services.title: Our Excellent AI Solutions for Your Business
services.description:
Cyneryx is a next-generation technology company specialising in AI-driven automation, robotics integration, and digital transformation for supply chain, logistics, warehousing, and industrial environments.

We help organisations design, build, integrate, and scale intelligent systems by combining Artificial Intelligence, robotics, and enterprise software into practical, real-world solutions. Our focus is on making advanced technology accessible, scalable, and cost-effective for businesses of all sizes.

What We Do

At Cyneryx, we operate at the intersection of AI, robotics, and enterprise systems:

AI Solutions & Automation

AI orchestration engines

Computer vision & AI vision gateways

Predictive maintenance and operational intelligence

Data-driven decision support systems

Robotics & Warehouse Automation

Integration of AMRs, ACRs, and robotic systems

Vendor-agnostic robotics middleware

Robotics-to-WMS/ERP connectivity

Autonomous and semi-autonomous system design

Supply Chain & Enterprise Technology

WMS, TMS, ERP integrations

Custom middleware and integration platforms

Process optimisation and system modernisation

Cloud-native and scalable architectures

Consulting & Product Innovation

Solution architecture & technical strategy

MVP and SaaS product development

AI-first product design

Digital transformation advisory

Our Approach

We are vendor-agnostic, outcome-driven, and deeply hands-on. Unlike traditional consultancies, Cyneryx blends engineering, AI, and business insight to deliver solutions that actually work on the ground—not just on paper.

Our mission is simple:

Make intelligent automation and AI practical, affordable, and impactful.

Who We Work With

We support startups, SMEs, and large enterprises, partnering closely with clients to modernise operations, unlock efficiency, and future-proof their technology landscape.
